AddRecyclingType.description: Add recycling type to recycling amenity
AddRecyclingType.filter: nodes, ways, relations with amenity = recycling and !recycling_type
AddRecyclingType.title: quest_recycling_type_title

AddSummitRegister.description: Add whether summit register is present
AddSummitRegister.filter:
nodes with
          natural = peak and name and
          (!summit:register or summit:register older today -4 years)
AddSummitRegister.title: quest_summit_register_title

AddClothingBinOperator.filter:
nodes with amenity = recycling and recycling_type = container
         and recycling:clothes = yes
         and !operator and !name and !brand
AddClothingBinOperator.title: quest_clothes_container_operator_title

AddTrafficSignalsSound.description: Add whether traffic signals have sound signals
AddTrafficSignalsSound.filter:
nodes with crossing = traffic_signals and highway ~ crossing|traffic_signals and foot != no
        and (
          !$SOUND_SIGNALS
          or $SOUND_SIGNALS = no and $SOUND_SIGNALS older today -4 years
          or $SOUND_SIGNALS older today -8 years
        )
AddTrafficSignalsSound.title: quest_traffic_signals_sound_title

AddProhibitedForPedestrians.description: Add whether roads are prohibited for pedestrians
AddProhibitedForPedestrians.filter:
ways with (
          ~'sidewalk(:both)?' ~ none|no or
          (sidewalk:left ~ none|no and sidewalk:right ~ none|no)
        )
        and shoulder != yes
        and !foot
        and access !~ private|no
AddProhibitedForPedestrians.title: quest_accessible_for_pedestrians_title

AddParkingFee.description: Add whether there is a parking fee
AddParkingFee.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with amenity = parking
        and access ~ yes|customers|public
        and (
            !fee and !fee:conditional
            or fee older today -8 years
        )
AddParkingFee.title: quest_parking_fee_title

AddBikeParkingFee.description: Add whether there is a bike parking fee
AddBikeParkingFee.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with amenity = bicycle_parking
        and access ~ yes|customers|public
        and (
            name
            or bicycle_parking ~ building|lockers|shed
            or capacity >= 100
        )
        and (
            !fee and !fee:conditional
            or fee older today -8 years
        )
AddBikeParkingFee.title: quest_bicycle_parking_fee_title

AddBoardType.filter:
nodes with information = board
         and access !~ private|no
         and (!board_type or board_type ~ yes|board)
AddBoardType.title: quest_board_type_title

AddTactilePavingKerb.filter:
nodes with
          !tactile_paving
          or tactile_paving = unknown
          or tactile_paving = no and tactile_paving older today -4 years
          or tactile_paving = yes and tactile_paving older today -8 years
AddTactilePavingKerb.title: quest_tactile_paving_kerb_title

AddCameraType.filter:
nodes with
         surveillance:type = camera
         and surveillance ~ public|outdoor|traffic
         and !camera:type
AddCameraType.title: quest_camera_type_title

AddInternetAccess.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with
        (
          amenity ~ library|community_centre|youth_centre
          or tourism ~ hotel|guest_house|motel|hostel|alpine_hut|apartment|resort|camp_site|caravan_site|chalet
        )
        and name
        and (
          !internet_access
          or internet_access = yes
          or internet_access older today -2 years
        )
AddInternetAccess.title: quest_internet_access_name_title

AddBridgeStructure.filter: ways with man_made = bridge and !bridge:structure and !bridge:movable
AddBridgeStructure.title: quest_bridge_structure_title

AddKerbHeight.filter:
nodes with
          !kerb
          or kerb ~ yes|unknown
          or kerb !~ no|rolled and kerb older today -8 years
AddKerbHeight.title: quest_kerb_height_title

AddRecyclingContainerMaterials.filter:
nodes with
          amenity = recycling
          and recycling_type = container
          and access !~ private|no
AddRecyclingContainerMaterials.title: quest_recycling_materials_title

AddPlaygroundAccess.filter: nodes, ways, relations with leisure = playground and (!access or access = unknown)
AddPlaygroundAccess.title: quest_playground_access_title

AddMaxWeight.filter:
ways with highway ~ trunk|trunk_link|primary|primary_link|secondary|secondary_link|tertiary|tertiary_link|unclassified|residential|living_street|service
         and service != driveway
         and !maxweight and maxweight:signed != no
         and !maxaxleload
         and !maxbogieweight
         and !maxweight:hgv and !maxweight:bus and !maxweight:hgv_articulated and !maxweight:tourist_bus and !maxweight:coach
         and !maxweightrating and !maxweightrating:hgv and !maxweightrating:bus and !hgv
         and !maxunladenweight and !maxunladenweight:hgv and !maxunladenweight:bus
         and bridge and bridge != no
         and motor_vehicle !~ private|no
         and vehicle !~ private|no
         and (access !~ private|no or (foot and foot !~ private|no))
         and area != yes
AddMaxWeight.title: quest_maxweight_title

AddReligionToWaysideShrine.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with
          historic = wayside_shrine
          and !religion
          and access !~ private|no
AddReligionToWaysideShrine.title: quest_religion_for_wayside_shrine_title

AddBikeParkingType.filter:
nodes, ways with
          amenity = bicycle_parking
          and access !~ private|no
          and !bicycle_parking
AddBikeParkingType.title: quest_bicycle_parking_type_title

AddHandrail.description: Add whether steps have a handrail
AddHandrail.filter:
ways with highway = steps
         and (!indoor or indoor = no)
         and access !~ private|no
         and (!conveying or conveying = no)
         and (
           !handrail and !handrail:center and !handrail:left and !handrail:right
           or handrail = no and handrail older today -4 years
           or handrail older today -8 years
           or older today -8 years
         )
AddHandrail.title: quest_handrail_title

AddStepsIncline.description: Add which way leads up for these steps
AddStepsIncline.filter:
ways with highway = steps
         and (!indoor or indoor = no)
         and area != yes
         and access !~ private|no
         and !incline
AddStepsIncline.title: quest_steps_incline_title

AddTracktype.filter:
ways with highway = track
        and (
          !tracktype
          or tracktype != grade1 and tracktype older today -4 years
          or surface ~ ${ANYTHING_UNPAVED.joinToString(
AddTracktype.title: quest_tracktype_title

AddDrinkingWater.filter:
nodes with (
            man_made = water_tap
            or man_made = water_well
            or natural = spring
        )
        and access !~ private|no and indoor != yes
        and !drinking_water and !drinking_water:legal and amenity != drinking_water
AddDrinkingWater.title: quest_drinking_water_title

AddTrafficSignalsVibration.description: Add whether traffic signals have tactile indication that it's safe to cross
AddTrafficSignalsVibration.filter:
nodes with crossing = traffic_signals and highway ~ crossing|traffic_signals and foot!=no
        and (
          !$VIBRATING_BUTTON
          or $VIBRATING_BUTTON = no and $VIBRATING_BUTTON older today -4 years
          or $VIBRATING_BUTTON older today -8 years
        )
AddTrafficSignalsVibration.title: quest_traffic_signals_vibrate_title

AddAddressStreet.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with
          addr:housenumber and !addr:street and !addr:place and !addr:block_number
          or addr:streetnumber and !addr:street
AddAddressStreet.title: quest_address_street_title

AddStepsRamp.description: Add whether steps have a ramp
AddStepsRamp.filter:
ways with highway = steps
         and (!indoor or indoor = no)
         and access !~ private|no
         and (!conveying or conveying = no)
         and ramp != separate
         and (
           !ramp
           or (ramp = yes and !ramp:stroller and !ramp:bicycle and !ramp:wheelchair)
           or ramp = no and ramp older today -4 years
           or ramp older today -8 years
         )
AddStepsRamp.title: quest_steps_ramp_title

MarkCompletedBuildingConstruction.description: Determine whether construction is now completed
MarkCompletedBuildingConstruction.filter:
ways with building = construction
         and (!opening_date or opening_date < today)
         and older today -6 months
MarkCompletedBuildingConstruction.title: quest_construction_building_title

AddRailwayCrossingBarrier.description: Add type of barrier for railway crossing
AddRailwayCrossingBarrier.filter:
nodes with
          railway = level_crossing
          and (!crossing:barrier or crossing:barrier older today -8 years)
AddRailwayCrossingBarrier.title: quest_railway_crossing_barrier_title

AddBenchBackrest.filter:
nodes, ways with
          amenity = bench
          and (!area or area = no)
          and !backrest
          and !bench:type
AddBenchBackrest.title: quest_bench_backrest_title

AddTrafficSignalsButton.description: Add whether traffic signals have a button for pedestrians
AddTrafficSignalsButton.filter:
nodes with
          crossing = traffic_signals
          and highway ~ crossing|traffic_signals
          and foot != no
          and !button_operated
AddTrafficSignalsButton.title: quest_traffic_signals_button_title

AddStepCount.filter:
ways with highway = steps
         and (!indoor or indoor = no)
         and access !~ private|no
         and (!conveying or conveying = no)
         and !step_count
AddStepCount.title: quest_step_count_title

AddChargingStationOperator.filter:
nodes, ways with
          amenity = charging_station
          and !operator and !name and !brand
AddChargingStationOperator.title: quest_charging_station_operator_title

AddIsDefibrillatorIndoor.description: Add whether defibrillator is inside building
AddIsDefibrillatorIndoor.filter:
nodes with
         emergency = defibrillator
         and access !~ private|no
         and !indoor
AddIsDefibrillatorIndoor.title: quest_is_defibrillator_inside_title

AddCrossing.description: Add whether there is a crossing
AddCrossing.filter:
ways with
          highway ~ trunk|trunk_link|primary|primary_link|secondary|secondary_link|tertiary|tertiary_link|unclassified|residential
          and area != yes
          and (access !~ private|no or (foot and foot !~ private|no))
AddCrossing.title: quest_crossing_title

AddCrossingType.filter:
nodes with highway = crossing
          and foot != no
          and (
            !crossing
            or crossing ~ island|unknown|yes
            or (
              crossing ~ traffic_signals|uncontrolled|zebra|marked|unmarked
              and crossing older today -8 years
            )
          )
AddCrossingType.title: quest_crossing_type_title

CheckShopType.description: Check if vacant shop is still vacant
CheckShopType.title: quest_shop_vacant_type_title

AddBarrierType.description: Add specific barrier type on a point
AddBarrierType.filter:
nodes with barrier=yes
         and !man_made
         and !historic
         and !military
         and !power
         and !tourism
         and !attraction
         and !amenity
         and !leisure
AddBarrierType.title: quest_barrier_type_title

AddBikeParkingAccess.description: Add type of bike parking access
AddBikeParkingAccess.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with amenity = bicycle_parking
        and bicycle_parking ~ building|lockers|shed
        and (!access or access = unknown)
AddBikeParkingAccess.title: quest_bicycle_parking_access_title

AddParkingAccess.filter:
nodes, ways, relations with amenity = parking
        and (
            access = unknown
            or (!access and parking !~ street_side|lane)
        )
AddParkingAccess.title: quest_parking_access_title

AddCyclewaySegregation.description: Add segregated status for combined footway with cycleway
AddCyclewaySegregation.filter:
ways with
        (
          (highway = path and bicycle = designated and foot = designated)
          or (highway = footway and bicycle = designated)
          or (highway = cycleway and foot ~ designated|yes)
        )
        and surface ~ ${ANYTHING_PAVED.joinToString(
AddCyclewaySegregation.title: quest_segregated_title

DetermineRecyclingGlass.description: Determine whether any glass or just glass bottles can be recycled here
DetermineRecyclingGlass.filter:
nodes with amenity = recycling and recycling_type = container
         and recycling:glass = yes and !recycling:glass_bottles
DetermineRecyclingGlass.title: quest_recycling_glass_title

AddAtmOperator.filter: nodes with amenity = atm and !operator and !name and !brand
AddAtmOperator.title: quest_atm_operator_title
